title: HAP 05 - Father Knows Best - Moral and Political Philosophy in the Instructions
itunes:title: HAP 05 - Father Knows Best - Moral and Political Philosophy in the Instructions
description: Ethical reflection in ancient Egyptian grave inscriptions and in works of instruction, such as the Maxims of Ptahhotep and the Instructions named for Amenemope, Ani, and Merikare.
content:encoded: Ethical reflection in ancient Egyptian grave inscriptions and in works of instruction, such as the Maxims of Ptahhotep and the Instructions named for Amenemope, Ani, and Merikare.
itunes:subtitle: Ethical reflection in ancient Egyptian grave inscriptions and in works of instruction, such as the Maxims of Ptahhotep and the Instructions named for Amenemope, Ani, and Merikare.
itunes:summary: Ethical reflection in ancient Egyptian grave inscriptions and in works of instruction, such as the Maxims of Ptahhotep and the Instructions named for Amenemope, Ani, and Merikare.
itunes:author: Peter Adamson, Jonardon Ganeri, Chike Jeffers
